00013 bool NGramAnalyzer::analyze(const TermList&  input, TermList& output){
00014         if(isCharLevel){
00015                 TermList::const_iterator it = input.begin();
00016                 for(; it != input.end(); it ++){
00017                         int len = it->text.length();
00018                         if(minGram_ > len)
00019                                 continue;
00020                         int max_gram = min(len, maxGram_);
00021 
00022                         for(int ngram = minGram_ ; ngram <= max_gram ; ngram ++){
00023                                 for(int start = 0; start <= len - ngram ; start ++){
00024                                         Term newTerm(*it);
00025                                         newTerm.text = newTerm.text.substr(start, ngram);
00026                                         output.push_back(newTerm);
00027                                 }
00028                         }
00029                 }
00030         }
00031         else{ // word-based ngram
00032                 int len = input.size();
00033                 if(minGram_ > len)
00034                         return false;
00035                 int max_gram = min(len, maxGram_);
00036                 UString space(" ", UString::UTF_8);
00037                 for(int ngram = minGram_ ; ngram <= max_gram ; ngram ++){
00038                         TermList::const_iterator it_start = input.begin();
00039                         TermList::const_iterator it_sub;
00040                         TermList::const_iterator it_pre;
00041                         for(int start = 0; start <= len - ngram ; start ++, it_start++){
00042                                 Term newTerm(*it_start);
00043                                 bool splitted = false;
00044                                 UString newText = it_start->text;
00045                                 int end = start + ngram;
00046                                 it_sub = it_start;
00047                                 it_pre = it_sub;
00048                                 it_sub ++;
00049                                 for(int i = start + 1; i < end; i++ , it_sub ++){
00050                                         newText += space;
00051                                         newText += it_sub->text;
00052                                         if(it_sub->wordOffset != it_pre->wordOffset + 2 )  // todo how to check that two words should splited
00053                                                 splitted = true;
00054                                         it_pre = it_sub;
00055                                 }
00056                                 newTerm.text = newText;
00057                                 newTerm.end = it_pre->end;
00058 
00059                                 if(!splitted)
00060                                         output.push_back(newTerm);
00061                         }
00062                 }
00063 
00064         }
00065         return true;
00066 }
00067 bool NGramAnalyzer::analyze(TermList& InOutPut){
00068         TermList input(InOutPut);
00069         InOutPut.clear();
00070         if(isCharLevel){
00071                 TermList::iterator it = input.begin();
00072                 for(int i = 0 ; it != input.end(); it ++){
00073                         int len = it->text.length();
00074                         if(minGram_ > len)
00075                                 continue;
00076                         int max_gram = min(len, maxGram_);
00077 
00078                         for(int ngram = minGram_ ; ngram <= max_gram ; ngram ++){
00079                                 for(int start = 0; start <= len - ngram ; start ++){
00080                                         Term newTerm(*it);
00081                                         newTerm.text = newTerm.text.substr(start, ngram);
00082                                         InOutPut.push_back(newTerm);
00083                                 }
00084                         }
00085                 }
00086         }
00087         else{ // word-based ngram
00088                 int len = input.size();
00089                 if(minGram_ > len)
00090                         return false;

00095                         TermList::const_iterator it_sub;
00096                         TermList::const_iterator it_pre;
00097                         for(int start = 0; start <= len - ngram ; start ++, it_start++){
00098                                 Term newTerm(*it_start);
00099                                 bool splitted = false;
00100                                 UString newText = it_start->text;
